debates.showAs: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children’s Health Act 2018 and therefore to amend the National Paediatric Hospital Development Board (Establishment) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 246 of 2007) so as to direct that the National Children’s Hospital be named Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte Leanaí, 2018 agus, dá bhrí sin, do leasú an Ordaithe um Bord Forbartha an Ospidéil Náisiúnta Phéidiatraicigh (Bunú), 2007 (I.R. Uimh. 246 de 2007) d’fhonn a threorú go dtabharfar Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí ar Ospidéal Náisiúnta na Leanaí.
bill.shortTitleEn: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte Leanaí (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Health Act 2004 and for that purpose to provide for the conferral of additional functions on the Minister for Health in relation to setting of priorities and performance targets by that Minister in relation to maximum waiting times for health and personal social services; to amend the National Treatment Purchase Fund Board (Establishment) Order 2004 to provide for additional reporting, revised corporate governance and accountability arrangements; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta Sláinte, 2004 agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna breise a thabhairt don Aire Sláinte i ndáil leis an Aire sin do shocrú tosaíochtaí agus spriocanna feidhmíochta i ndáil le huastréimhsí feithimh i gcomhair seirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta; do leasú an Ordaithe fá Bhord an Chiste Náisiúnta um Cheannach Cóireála (Bunú), 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le tuairisciú breise, rialachas corparáideach athmheasta agus socruithe i ndáil le cuntasacht; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Liostaí Feithimh), 2024

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Mental Health Act 2001.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Meabhair-Shláinte (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require pharmaceutical companies, medical equipment suppliers and their servants or agents, to declare payments, gifts, donations or other transfers of values provided to healthcare professionals or health care organisations on an annual basis.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar chuideachtaí cógaisíochta, ar sholáthraithe trealaimh liachta agus ar sheirbhísigh nó gníomhairí dá gcuid dearbhú a dhéanamh i leith íocaíochtaí, bronntanas, síntiús nó aistrithe eile ar luach a sholáthraítear do ghairmithe cúraim sláinte nó d’eagraíochtaí cúraim sláinte ar bhonn bliantúil.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Cúraim Sláinte (Íocaíochtaí Trédhearcacha), 2022

debates.showAs: Health (Parliamentary Oversight of Certain Instruments Relating to Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 1947, and for that purpose to provide for parliamentary oversight of regulations made by the Minister for Health under section 31A of that Act and of orders made by that Minister under section 31B of that Act and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1947, agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le formhaoirsiú parlaiminteach ar rialacháin arna ndéanamh ag an Aire Sláinte faoi alt 31A den Acht sin agus ar orduithe arna ndéanamh ag an Aire sin faoi alt 31B den Acht sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Parliamentary Oversight of Certain Instruments Relating to Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Formhaoirsiú Parlaiminteach ar Ionstraimí Áirithe a Bhaineann le Covid-19), 2021

debates.showAs: Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed)
Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to make it a breach of contract or licence under the Act to prohibit a member of the National Union of Journalists from communications media for reason or reasons of occupation, employer, or employment status.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun sárú ar chonradh nó ceadúnas faoin Acht a dhéanamh de chomhalta de Cheardchumann Náisiúnta na nIriseoirí a thoirmeasc ó mheáin cumarsáide ar chúis nó cúiseanna slí beatha, fostóra nó stádais fostaíochta.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Craolacháin (Leasú) (Iriseoireacht a Chosaint), 2019

debates.showAs: Waste Management (Amendment) (Regulator) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Waste Management Act 1996 to require the Minister to produce a report on the appointment of an independent regulator for the domestic waste management sector, including the regulation of domestic waste charges.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Bainistiú Dramhaíola, 1996 chun a cheangal ar an Aire tuarascáil a thabhairt ar aird maidir le rialálaí neamhspleách a cheapadh don earnáil bainistithe dramhaíola tí, lena n-áirítear muirir dramhaíola tí a rialáil.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bainistiú Dramhaíola (Leasú) (Rialálaí), 2019

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Leave to Withdraw
Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 to prohibit the practice of designating employment as self-employment; to bring the Garda Síochána, the Defence Forces, and doctors in training, under the protection of the Act; to limit the race to the bottom on workers rights by extending elements of the Act to the self-employed; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 chun an cleachtas arb éard é fostaíocht a shainainmniú mar fhéinfhostaíocht a thoirmeasc; do thabhairt an Gharda Síochána, Óglaigh na hÉireann agus ábhar dochtúirí faoi chosaint an Achta; do chur teorainn leis an gclaonadh chun donais i dtaca le cearta oibrithe trí ghnéithe den Acht a leathnú chuig daoine féinfhostaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Workers Rights and Bogus Self-Employment) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Cearta Oibrithe agus Féinfhostaíocht Bhréagach) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Freedom of Information (Oversight of the Office of the President) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Freedom of Information Act 2014 to allow for the Office of the President of Ireland to be subject to freedom of information requests; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shaoráil Faisnéise, 2014 chun a cheadú go mbeidh Oifig Uachtarán na hÉireann faoi réir iarrataí saorála faisnéise agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Freedom Of Information (Oversight of the Office of the President) (Amendment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoráil Faisnéise (Formhaoirsiú ar Oifig an Uachtaráin) (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Extreme Weather (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Extreme Weather (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Extreme Weather (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to provide for the safety of employees during certain severe weather warnings issued by Met Éireann; to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 to provide for the protection of public safety and the safety of rescue service personnel during such a weather warning and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le sábháilteacht fostaithe le linn rabhaidh áirithe i dtaca le haimsir anróiteach, arna n-eisiúint ag Met Éireann, a bheith i bhfeidhm; do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cosaint a thabhairt do shábháilteacht phoiblí agus do shábháilteacht pearsanra seirbhíse tarrthála le linn rabhadh aimsire den sórt sin a bheith i bhfeidhm agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Adhaimsir (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2018

debates.showAs: Arts (Dignity at Work) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Arts Council to ensure that funding is contingent on compliance with employment law and for that purpose to amend the Arts Act 2003; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Chomhairle Ealaíon a chinntiú go mbeidh maoiniú ag brath ar an dlí fostaíochta a bheith á chomhlíonadh agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Ealaíon, 2003; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ealaíon (Dínit ag an Obair) (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Trade Union Representation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Trade Union Representation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Trade Union Representation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Trade Union Act 1941 and the Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act 2001 to confer on authorised unions the right to have their representative duties to their members for collective bargaining and disciplinary matters recognised by employers and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Ceárd-Chumann, 1941 agus an Achta Caidrimh Thionscail (Leasú), 2001 chun an ceart a thabhairt do chumainn údaraithe go n-aithneoidh fostóirí na dualgais ionadaíochta atá ar na cumainn sin i leith a gcomhaltaí maidir le cómhargántaíocht agus nithe araíonachta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ionadaíocht Cheardchumainn (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2018

debates.showAs: Comptroller and Auditor General (Accountability of Recipients of Public Funds) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to extend the power of the Comptroller and Auditor General to inspect the accounts, books and records of persons in receipt of public funds, and to provide for connected matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leathnú chumhacht an Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste chun cuntais, leabhair agus taifid daoine a fhaigheann cistí poiblí a iniúchadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Comptroller and Auditor General (Accountability of Recipients of Public Funds) (Amendment) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste (Cuntasacht Faighteoirí Cistí Poiblí) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Trade Union (Garda Síochána and the Defence Forces) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to remove the bar on a Garda Síochána or Defence Forces association from associating with, or affiliating to, any trade union or any other association; to remove the bar on a Defence Force member from becoming a member of a Defence Force association that may wish to reconstitute itself as a trade union; and to prohibit the use of strike action by an Garda Síochána or Defence Forces associations and trade unions for reasons of public safety
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun deireadh a chur leis an gcosc ar chomhlachas de chuid an Gharda Síochána nó na bhFórsaí Cosanta comhlachas a dhéanamh, nó cleamhnú, le haon cheardchumann ná le haon chomhlachas eile; chun deireadh a chur leis an gcosc ar chomhalta de na Fórsaí Cosanta teacht chun bheith ina chomhalta nó ina comhalta de chomhlachas de chuid na bhFórsaí Cosanta, ar comhlachas é a bhféadfadh sé gur mhian leis é féin a athbhunú mar cheardchumann; agus chun a thoirmeasc ar chomhlachais de chuid an Gharda Síochána nó na bhFórsaí Cosanta, ar chúiseanna sábháilteachta poiblí, gníomh stailce a úsáid
bill.shortTitleEn: Trade Union (Garda Síochána and the Defence Forces) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ceardchumann (An Garda Síochána agus na Fórsaí Cosanta), 2017

debates.showAs: Protection of Employees (Collective Redundancies) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Protection of Employees (Collective Redundancies) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee
Protection of Employees (Collective Redundancies) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for protections for employees in collective redundancy situations in which the employer is insolvent and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cosaintí d'fhostaithe i gcásanna comhiomarcaíochta ina bhfuil an fostóir dócmhainneach agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Fostaithe (Comhiomarcaíochtaí), 2017

debates.showAs: Pensions (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Pensions Act 1990 to prevent solvent companies walking away and reneging on their pension obligations to their employees
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990 chun cosc a chur ar chuideachtaí sócmhainneacha imeacht leo agus loiceadh ar a n-oibleagáidí pinsin i leith a bhfostaithe
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na bPinsean (Leasú) 2017

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Right to Access) (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Right to Access) (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Industrial Relations (Right to Access) (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act 2015 so as to allow Trade Unions access to their members in the workplace for purposes related to the employment of its members or for purposes related to the Union's business or both
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Caidrimh Thionscail (Leasú), 2015 chun a cheadú do Cheardchumainn rochtain a bheith acu ar a gcomhaltaí san áit oibre chun críocha a bhaineann le fostaíocht a chomhaltaí nó chun críocha a bhaineann le gnó an Cheardchumainn nó a bhaineann leo araon
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (An Ceart chun Rochtana) (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Companies (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Companies Act 2014 to hold a company officer or officers acting on behalf of a corporate body personally liable where a breach of employment law is committed
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 chun go mbreithneofar oifigeach cuideachta nó oifigigh chuideachta a bheidh ag gníomhú thar ceann comhlacht corpraithe a bheith faoi dhliteanas go pearsanta i gcás go ndéanfar sárú ar an dlí fostaíochta
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCuideachtaí (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Banded Hours Contract Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Banded Hours Contract Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Banded Hours Contract Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Banded Hours Contract Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for banded hour contracts, the right for a worker to request increased hours and a corresponding obligation on an employer to consider such a request, to permit refusal only on objectively justified grounds and an obligation on employers to provide information to workers on the overall availability of working hours in the employment
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le conarthaí uaireanta bandáilte, maidir le ceart oibrí chun uaireanta méadaithe a iarraidh agus maidir le hoibleagáid chomhfhreagrach a bheith ar fhostóir iarraidh den sórt sin a bhreithniú, do cheadú diúltú ar fhorais is inchosanta go hoibiachtúil, agus sa chás sin amháin, agus maidir le hoibleagáid a bheith ar fhostóirí faisnéis a sholáthar d'oibrithe i dtaobh infhaighteacht fhoriomlán na n-uaireanta oibre san fhostaíocht
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chonarthaí Uaireanta Bandáilte, 2016

debates.showAs: Equal Status (Equality Proofing) (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote equality in the functioning of public bodies, to provide that regard be had by public bodies to the desirability of reducing socio-economic and other inequalities, to provide for the carrying out of equality impact assessments in respect of measures that are likely to have a significant impact or effect on the equality of opportunity between persons, to provide for the administration by the Equality Authority of various matters pertaining to this Act, to amend the Equal Status Act 2000, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur an chomhionannais chun cinn i bhfeidhmiú comhlachtaí poiblí, do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh aird ag comhlachtaí poiblí ar a inmhianaithe atá sé éagothromais shocheacnamaíocha agus eile a laghdú, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le measúnachtaí tionchair comhionannais a dhéanamh i leith bearta ar dóigh tionchar suntasach a bheith acu nó éifeacht shuntasach a bheith leo ar chomhionannas deiseanna idir daoine, do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Údarás Comhionannais do riaradh nithe éagsúla a bhaineann leis an Acht seo, do leasú an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Stádas Comhionann (Promhadh Comhionannais) (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: Céim an Choiste

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: Corporate Manslaughter Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create the indictable offence of corporate manslaughter by an undertaking, to create the indictable offence of grossly negligent management causing death by a high managerial agent of the undertaking, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é dúnorgain chorparáideach ag gnóthas, do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é bainistiú mórfhaillíoch ag gníomhaire is ardbhainisteoir de chuid an ghnóthais, ar bainistiú mórfhaillíoch é is cúis le bás, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhúnorgain Chorparáideach, 2013
